name: Escape From Time-Travelling Robots Production Plant
name_original: Escape From Time-Travelling Robots Production Plant
description:
You are a time-travelling robot. One day you get activated inside an abandoned time-travelling robots' production plant. You want to get out, but the exit is sealed. You check in the future, and now it's overgrown with plants. If you turn off the water with the water switch and block off the sunlight with the shutters switch, they won't grow and you'll be able to leave!

WSAD - walk 
J - jump 
K - swap between past and future
Backspace - check the map of the production plant

Made for GBJAM 10
